title: Request Materials from Warehouse
description: A line operator is running low on a specific component and needs to request more from the central warehouse.

tasks.description: Identify the part number and the required quantity for the material request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the component and the standard replenishment quantity.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the component in the main warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that the warehouse has sufficient stock.

tasks.description: Submit a material requisition request to the warehouse.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the request, and a pick ticket is generated for the warehouse team.
